extendedInfo.description: Take your health into your own hands with HAP OnTheGo â your mobile health and wellness resource.With this secure app you can:â¢ Access the HAP Symptom Checker â identify a problem area, choose your symptom(s), and learn what to do next â it may tell you to head to the doctor or to try home treatment.  It will detail your home treatment options, provide prevention tips, help you prepare for an appointment & more.â¢ Access the HAP Conditions Manager â weâve got you covered from the common cold to cancer to quitting smoking to diabetes to weight management.  Learn more about your condition, including insight into symptoms, when to call a doctor, exams and test, treatment overview, home treatment, medications, surgery & more.â¢ Find a doctor, urgent care center or hospital and schedule appointments with ease using the click to call feature. â¢ View your most recent ID card in real-time and on the go â¢ View the ID card for your spouse and any dependents on your policyâ¢ Email or fax any ID card on your policy to a doctor office, hospital or pharmacyâ¢ Link to directions and contact info for any doctor that you look upâ¢ Get information to help you during a travel emergencyâ¢ Access important contact informationTo gain secure access:â¢ Download the appâ¢ Enter your member ID numberâ¢ Enter your 4-digit Year of Birth (####)â¢ For additional details, visit hap.org/onthegoD card does not guarantee eligibility; your provider must confirm eligibility at the time of your visit. Dual coverage scenarios are not supported by this application; those with dual HAP policies will see the last card he/she received.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app but a little slow to switch between cards on my Galaxy S3.

reviews.comment: Garbage!!!! Just like the company

reviews.title: New id numbers don\'t work
reviews.comment: Great app...until Hap changed the id numbers mid year.  App doesn\'t recognize new number.  Useless now.

reviews.title: Great idea!
reviews.comment: I really like how easy it is to fax or email my information. The only thing that would be more helpful is if we could store our doctors fax and email so we don\'t need to input it every time we need to send it.
reviews.author: Rachel Jacquin

reviews.title: HAP\'s Enhancing Lives!
reviews.comment: Thanx HAP 4 the mobile app! No more cards clogging the wallet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is great. I lose my card all the time.
reviews.comment: This app is great. I lose my card all the time. The app has not once crashed on me, my doctors seem to think it\'s more convenient as well.
reviews.author: c glass

reviews.title: New cards
reviews.comment: The new Hap Id cards have a letterr in front of the numbers and I\'m unable to log on. Please fix
reviews.author: Chevyx xCouture

reviews.title: Perfection
reviews.comment: I just moved and couldn\'t locate my card. After finding it, I got this app. Now I\'m no longer worried about being unable to find it! :)

reviews.comment: Whoo hoo

reviews.title: Great APP
